comments.body: @yar3333  I might be mistaken but I don't see this : http://threejs.org/docs/#Reference/Extras.Helpers/ArrowHelper  all I see is `.setLength(length)`
@yar3333 we try not to add features if they are not documented as perhaps the developers don't want this used. I sent a PR to confirm from them : https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/pull/5392
